title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g'(-3)

1 point is earned for g''(-3)

g'(x)=f(x) ⇒ g'(-3)=f(-3)=2

g''(x)=f'(x) ⇒ g''(-3)=f'(-3)=1
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(-3)

1 point is earned for g''(-3)

g'(x)=f(x) ⇒ g'(-3)=f(-3)=2

g''(x)=f'(x) ⇒ g''(-3)=f'(-3)=1

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(-3)

1 point is earned for g''(-3)

g'(x)=f(x) ⇒ g'(-3)=f(-3)=2

g''(x)=f'(x) ⇒ g''(-3)=f'(-3)=1

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for g'(-3)

1 point is earned for g''(-3)

g'(x)=f(x) ⇒ g'(-3)=f(-3)=2

g''(x)=f'(x) ⇒ g''(-3)=f'(-3)=1
